description: Try our easy to follow Asparagus & Udon Noodle Stir-fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Asparagus & Udon Noodle Stir-fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain on kitchen paper, then keep warm by placing on the plate in the oven. Meanwhile, pour 1 litre vegetable stock into a medium saucepan with the reserved marinade and bring to the boil. Add 400 g asparagus tips, 50 g soya beans, 50 g frozen peas, 1 teaspoon grated fresh root ginger and 400 g straight-to-the-wok udon noodles and simmer about 3-4 minutes until the vegetables are just tender. Divide between 4 bowls and share out the tofu cubes between each. Top with 25 g roughly chopped coriander leaves and serve drizzled with a little chilli oil.
